features: Diameter: 9 Inches Forehead Circumference: 26.77 Inches (68 cms)
Great for LARP (live action role playing), kids, cosplay, Halloween, fancy dress, theatrical props, and historical reenactments
description: Some armour designs were nearly universal across Europe during the Middle Ages. /The Norse Steel Spangenhelm recreates one of the most common helmets. / This steel helmet has the distinctive nasal guard and an antiqued finish. / Steel strips cross the top of the cap and line the bottom edge. / Rivets join the strips and the nasal guard to the base. / The Viking helmet attaches to the wearer with a lainer head strap that adjusts with a buckle. / This medieval helmet is wonderful for historical reenactments or cosplay events.
